author: deborah
title: Anti-Polarization Social Platform
description: The problem of polarization, fueled by social media incentives to extremist opinions, unreliable information, and information operations.
solution: A social media platform based on social science with blockchain incentives to build social discourse, and detect adversarial info operations
experience: Invented first intelligent agent social simulation and award winning neural net agent simulations of polarizing Info Ops in social media
